edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.games.ServerControllers

Class TwoPlayerGameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.server.Controllers.ServiceController
      • edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.server.Controllers.ChatController
        • edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.games.ServerControllers.TwoPlayerGameController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TicTacToeController

    public abstract class TwoPlayerGameController
extends ChatController
    an abstract service classification for games which have two players all two-player games should extend this
    Version:
    for CS56, Spring 2017
    Author:
    David Roster, Harrison Wang
